review_text: Love Five Guys as they always have the best fries in town. absolutely crunchy outside and soft inside, just the right amount. You can customize your burger, and they never mess it up, plus the great fries. They are just a fav go-to place for a quick burger and fries. The fact that they give you free peanuts in shell and have their potato bags all around the store with the peanut oil which they fry it in just creates an awesome environment. Love the open kitchen and the fact that you can see the fries are cut right there, with skin in different shapes. Just so much better than many fast food chains. I just wish they were open longer hours and had more locations.

Five Guys is a burger paradise in the heart of Vancouver. What sets this joint apart is the fantastic ability to customize your burger just the way you like it. The sheer range of toppings and sauces available ensures that every burger is a unique and personalized experience. The staffs friendly and accommodating nature makes the customization process a breeze. The burgers themselves are absolute showstoppers. Juicy, flavorful, and made to perfection, these burgers are a testament to the quality of ingredients used. The melt-in-your-mouth experience is unmatched, and its evident that a lot of care goes into preparing each burger. Now, lets talk about the fries - theyre more than just a side dish, theyre an experience on their own. Crispy on the outside and perfectly tender on the inside, these fries are simply addictive. The fact that theyre hand-cut and made fresh right there adds an extra level of deliciousness. The ambiance is lively and inviting, adding to the overall enjoyment of the meal. Whether youre a solo diner or with a group of friends, the welcoming atmosphere makes every visit enjoyable. For a truly customizable and mouthwatering burger experience paired with some of the best fries around, Five Guys in Vancouver is the place to be. The quality, flavor, and the ability to make your burger your own truly sets it apart. A must-visit for burger enthusiasts.
Pretty solid burger  , juicy, good size and tasty. Love how any extras are included and also the free peanuts. The jalapenos also had a good   to them

Ohhhh, man. I myself am a burger enthusiast, and I am always thrilled to come to Five Guys. They always know how to cook and serve. Fries were a bit salty, but it perfectly balanced the fatty taste from the burger. I always order my burger with some bacon in it, never regretted. They use peanut oil, so be careful with your allergies. They do bottomless refills on pop and unlimited supply of toasted peanuts. Peanuts, you would think. But it was ridiculous how many peanuts I had. At first, it doesnt feel anything special, then 10 minutes later, you are left with piles of peanut shells. I know its American chain, but you gotta enjoy this.

I ordered a hot dog as I cant eat too much and it was the perfect size. The taste was also very good. My friend who ordered a hamburger was surprised at how big the hamburger was. I would like to go there again if there is another opportunity because it tastes good and I can eat slowly.

The fries were well seasoned, crispy on the outside and soft on the inside (I highly recommend the cajun style fries). This place is essentially a step above fast food, fast food + if you will. The floors had food and garbage, and the bathrooms were filthy.  The bathrooms were a major one for me because the mess appeared to have been there all day. Bin 4 Burger Lounge (2996 Granville St., Vancouver) I recently had the pleasure of dining at Bin 4 Burger Lounge located on Granville Street in Vancouver, and I must say that it was a delightful experience. This trendy and cozy restaurant specializes in crafting gourmet burgers with a unique twist, and it certainly lived up to its reputation. First and foremost, the ambiance of Bin 4 Burger Lounge was inviting and contemporary. The interior was tastefully decorated with a combination of rustic and modern elements, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The seating arrangements were comfortable, and the staff was attentive and friendly, providing prompt service throughout my visit. Now lets talk about the star of the show the burgers. Bin 4 Burger Lounge offers an extensive selection of burgers, each with its own distinct flavor profile. From classic beef burgers to inventive vegetarian options, there is something to satisfy every palate. I opted for their signature Bin 4 Burger, and it did not disappoint. The patty was juicy, perfectly cooked, and seasoned to perfection. The toppings were fresh, and the brioche bun was soft and complemented the burger beautifully. The portion sizes were generous, ensuring that I left feeling completely satisfied. In addition to their impressive burger menu, Bin 4 Burger Lounge also offers a variety of tasty sides and appetizers. Their truffle Parmesan fries were a standout, with a delightful combination of flavors that elevated the dining experience. The restaurant also boasts a selection of craft beers and cocktails to complement the meal, adding another layer of enjoyment. While the overall dining experience at Bin 4 Burger Lounge was excellent, there were a few minor areas where improvements could be made. Firstly, the wait times during peak hours can be a bit long, so its advisable to make a reservation or plan your visit accordingly. Secondly, the pricing is slightly on the higher side, especially when considering the add-ons and sides. However, the quality of the ingredients and the exceptional flavors justify the price to a large extent. In conclusion, Bin 4 Burger Lounge is a must-visit spot for burger enthusiasts in Vancouver. With its inviting atmosphere, flavorful burgers, and attentive service, it delivers a memorable dining experience. While it may be a bit pricey, the quality and taste of the food make it worth the investment. I will definitely be returning to Bin 4 Burger Lounge for another mouthwatering burger adventure in the future. Our server was Jessi, and he is very friendly and his service was superb. review_text: Spontaneous choice results in one of the best burgers I have ever eaten! Normally when we eat out, we review the place we go in order to get the value out of quantity, quality, service and atmosphere. Bin 4 Burger Lounge did not disappoint, despite being a spontaneous choice with little if any review. We were greeted by a friendly staff and sat down on their patio, where a brief review of the specials and happy hour drinks, which was followed by what was included in the regular menu choices and what was extras or up-scaling. After receiving our drinks and complementary home made chips (or crisps) we ordered a Black and Blue burger with their fires and a Wild Mushroom with up-scaled onion rings, both of which came with our choice of aioli dipping sauce. The Black & Blue with the jalapeno aioli sauce was juicy and topped with fresh tomato and arugula as well as a small mound of sweet red onion relish. All the flavours were distinct and complementary, with each of the described ingredients tasting fresh. The fries, as good as they were, may have been a bit too much for the appetite behind the order, and thus the salads we saw were envied for the refreshment that was desired. You know how it is, who doesnt want fries with it; until youre too full for the last three bites. As for the Wild Mushroom, it too was a delight. I might also add that the bun was PERFECT on both burgers; light and airy with good texture and chew needed to keep everything together until the last bite. The beef patties were also meaty and juicy (dripping down the hand juicy - worthy of an extra napkin) with a nice char reminding us of a great summer bbq.  The toppings were generous and again fresh, especially since I am quite critical to mushroom burgers at other locations where they charge an extra 1.00 for 5 mushroom slices that taste like nothing. THIS burger came with its own mushroom mountain that tasted like they were picked, sliced and sauteed 5 minutes ago. I dont need to say much about their onion rings because if you look at others photos, you will notice consistency of complete and utter yumminess. The pictures do not lie, they redefine what an onion ring should be. And the aioli sauces . . . I am desiring to taste them all. The jalapeno dip was different enough from the bacon aioli that I could not decide which of the two I liked the best. If I had any complaint, it would have to be with the tomato garnish. This is not a complaint against Bin 4, since we are all subject to what the tomato farmers give us out of their greenhouses. Where have all the tomatoes from my childhood gone? They tasted like tomatoes! All in all, this was a delight and a gem to remember! I am glad we can still be spontaneous and still feel rewarded for the choices we make.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Bro I ve been eyeing down this place for almost a year now. Never had the time to try it until this week. My mind was boggled when I opened this box. I was in awe. I was screaming in the car because it looked so good. And that first bite of the truffle cheesesteak was insane. The fries were insane. I loved everything about this spot. I am bringing friends to discover this with me.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: This is one of the best burgers I ve ever had! Shame I leave the country the day after. The brioche bun was glorious, gave the burger a creamy, buttery taste. Truffle chips were great too. Service was super kind, attentive but not too much. Thanks so much for a great meal, hope I can come back someday!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: YES. Amazing. All of it. Chicken is cooked to perfection.  Beef is tender and buns are fresh. Fries  yup!  Get some of this. Well worth the wait if there s a line up.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Totally understand the hype with this place! My friend and I ordered the Birria tacos and they were hands down the best Birria tacos I ve had in Vancouver. Filled with so much flavor and has a nice spice to it. The consomme and the garlic sauce on the side was also delicious. Sad that it s only around for a limited time but it s definitely a must try! My only complain was the service, the waitresses took a while to come take our orders as well as give our bills. However the food did come quite fast which was nice. Another down side is the fact that there s no toilet in the restaurant. Other than that, great food!!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: The sandwiches are just amazing. We ve had the hamburger, cheesesteak, and the chicken burger they re are exceptionally made I should say the staff do seem totally lost during busy hours though :)

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Had the pleasure of dining at Vonns and I must say, it was a beautiful experience. The restaurants biggest plus point for me is the fact that they offer halal options, which can be hard to come by. The beef and chicken dishes were both flavorful and cooked to perfection, with just the right amount of crispiness and warmth. The staff were incredibly friendly and accommodating, making our dining experience all the more enjoyable. The restaurant was very well managed in terms of seating and orders, which is always a plus. Located near English Bay, Vonns is definitely worth a visit if youre in town. Overall, I would highly recommend Vonns to anyone looking for a delicious and authentic halal dining experience. The food is top-notch, the staff are friendly and welcoming, and the atmosphere is warm and inviting. 5 stars!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Didn t have any steak when we went but we got the XD and top gun. Both were amazing. All the fries are hand scooped out of potatoes then fried. Never had something like that before. Parking: Downtown street parking hard to find

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: We live in the area and have walked by Vonns many times and finally made a special time to go and they are awesome. From the super friendly service to the quality of the food and we couldn t even finish our cheesesteak and x3 patty Burger   (that I destroyed later at home lol) and it s such a nice restaurant with great views of English bay and the area. No question we will be coming back!, Cheers!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Love it. Will be back again and again. Did a take away, took a tad bit longer than expected but I really enjoyed the monster serving of Nashville chicken and those truffle fries! One of the best halal burger joints I think!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I came for the original Philly Cheesesteak sandwich, it completely satisfied my craving and lived up to expectations. Great flavour, perfect amount of sauce and cheese, soft bun. The truffle scoop fries were crispy with some thicker, more wedge sized pieces, seasoned well but they didnt come with a sauce so they were on the drier side. Twice as much as I would spend on 2 items like this but it really is a great sandwich!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Absolutely amazing food!! The owner was super friendly and helpful! If I ever come back to the area, I will definitely be eating here again.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Walking around English Bay area in super hot weather, we just wanted to have a drink and some simple bites, passed by this restaurant, initially we were not so sure, but it totally exceeded our expectations, we only ordered truffle fries/ chips and a salad, they are probably the best fries/ chips and salad we have tasted. The staff was very friendly and attentive to customer needs too. Highly recommend!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: We really enjoy the food here. Not only is the staff friendly but the food is amazing. On top of that everything is halal. You will get your burger always freshly made. Taste is great and the meat is perfectly cooked. They have different portion for fries which is a plus. This location is small so most of the time it will take a waiting until you get a table but trust me it s worth the wait. If they would move to a bigger location I am sure it would be always packed! Keep up the good work.
response_from_owner_text: Loved having you with us  look forward to seeing you again

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Friendly waitresses, the service can be slower just because they re trying to keep up with the place full all the time! Have patience, don t go hangry, and it s worth the wait! Great classic cheeseburger and crispy chicken sandwich!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Was feeling like a cheesesteak so I found Vonns, and glad I did. Its easy to walk past, but the views of English Bay cant be beat. They have a patio area with umbrellas, as well as a shaded indoor seating area, but the whole restaurant is open to the bay so you get plenty of sun and noise from the beach. Food was fantastic, I dont know if Id go with the truffle cheesesteak again (its savory enough without the truffle  ), but the staff were friendly and accommodating, if a little busy. Wheelchair accessibility: They have a patio that opens right onto the sidewalk, with a pretty wide opening in the fence, and there are no elevation changes inside the seating area. Not sure if the washroom is accessible.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: This was on my list to check out while in Vancouver. It was absolutely delicious and lived up to my expectations from reviews and photos. I had the truffle fries with the classic burger and it was PHENOMENAL! The homemade fries/chips are sooo mouthwatering, I think I ll come and get some as takeout tomorrow. The burger was great too, one of the best simple burgers I ve had. Prices are so reasonable. Only thing I think I would change is the menu, it s a little small. Would be nice to have more drinks available or greens for on the side as well. The service was very friendly and the place is small and cozy. I will definitely be coming back.
response_from_owner_text: Hey Lauren, Thank you for your review. We love your feedback. We re on it, check back with us in a few weeks to see the additional options on our menu. Thank you again

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Wow! Amazing! Their cheesesteak was so delicious and it came with so much meat for a $16 plate! The chicken burger was also spicy and so delicious! They also have a combo which is fries and drinks that comes out for $5! Really good! Definitely will come back!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Very small dining room with students, families, and retired folks. The regular burger is big, meat has great flavor, even the bun is good. Truffle fries are a unique shape and worth ordering just those.  We couldn t finish it all, so asked for a to go box and was pleasantly surprised the fries reheat well the next day. Service was quick, friendly

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I was looking forward to eating there! Its quite far from my place but I took advantage of a walk on the seawall to stop here to have dinner. The chicken burger is delicious and generous, too bad that the fries are not included in the side. Its crispy as wished and the chicken is juicy. The steak was overcooked but the waitress was very nice and made it up for us. We found it okay but it was not our preferred option. The truffle fries were good but too salted, I will take regular fries next time :) Will definitely come back for the chicken sandwich though.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: This is a classic joint! With food we keep coming back to no matter how long it s been because its sooo hard to get a place since its quaint. Service is always top notch and we re always expecting a high bar with the quality.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Excellent place to dine right at the doorstep of English bay. The team here takes their quality seriously and it shows in their ingredient selection and in house sourcing. The Philly cheesesteak is my usual go to but their dynamic menu specials and limited time offerings make me want to try different items each time. The fries and all the varieties they come are a must try especially the Top Gun. The service has been consistently good each time and management is willing to go the extra mile to make your experience special. These guys take pride in what they do and it definitely shows in an exceptional all around experience each time

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Unique potato chips covered in truffle, nice crispy potatoes, satisfies a big appetite. Ordered the Medi Chic Sub and it was a delightful lunch. The sauce complements the sub and the sauerkraut really balances out the sandwich. I would come back here and try others. A bit steep on the wallet, however the location and especially view from the veranda is nice. Great halal spot. Would recommend others to come try as one of the go-to spots in yvr. The water for $2.35 on the menu is definitely a turn off, bring your own bottle :)

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Vonn s never disappoints! They re classic beef burger is my go to but last night I took a few bites from my husbands Chicken Nash & oh my goooodnessss! It was SOOOO yummy! The chicken was tender, juicy & the sauce they use is very flavourful! Honestly, you can t go wrong with anything on their menu! Also be sure to try their truffle fries! So yum!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Does it worth driving the 29 RV through downtown Vancouver? Absolutely yes. We ordered the classic burger and the Vonns Special (in the photo)

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: If I was a local, I would be eating at Vonns all the time. Everything we had here was amazing. When we got here, there was a bit of a wait but we didn t mind because we had heard positive things. Everything on the menu sounded really good so it was hard to pick just a few things. We ended up ordering The Rocket to share, which was my favourite item and something I highly recommend. We also ordered The XD burger and a Chic Halloumi Sando. Both of those were also really good and left us very full. The service is also great, with some really friendly staff members. Also, everything on the menu is halal so to anyone visiting Vancouver looking for halal restaurants, this is the spot! Easy 5 stars.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: The food and vibe was amazing!! Love that there s finally a restaurant that serves halal steaks The staff is super friendly and accommodating even during busy times. Portions were great and the price was affordable for the quality. Our server Cherry was very observant and immediately brought us a complimentary drink after I spilt mine. Will definitely be back soon!
response_from_owner_text: So glad you enjoyed the steak, Farina. Thanks so much for coming in, and for taking the time to write a review. Hope to see you again.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Before I came to Vancouver from Toronto, I heard a lot of good things about this place. Fast forward to today, I was not disappointed. Had the Vonns Special Philly cheesesteak with Truffle fries and the Top Gun loaded fries. One of the best cheesteaks Ive had in my life. Will definitely be back before I fly back to Toronto. Owner, if youre reading this, please open up a location in Toronto.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Finally! Find myself a halal-certified gourmet burger restaurant in Vancouver after only having Mediterranean/Persian foods whenever I eat out Officially had my first burger in Canada at Vonns Denman and it definitely set a high bar already! I tried their special menu of the week which is the XD burger. Premium beef patty coated with seasoned melted cheese. I was a bit surprised because it was a bit spicy but as a spicy food lover, my tongue like the flavor burst of it! The portion was more than decent, I guess it will keep you full until the next day . You should try to dip your burger and fries to the mayo-like sauce next to the ketchup, it adds some bold flavor-enhancing kicks to both of them!! Definitely will come back to try out their steak    and chicken burgers

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Downright the best best burgers and Philly Cheesesteak sandwich Ive ever had. Their chicken tenders were also really good. The overall service quality, to the ambience, and the food quality was exceptional. My previous best was Gladiators in Mississuaga, but now this takes the first spot. I just got to know theyre opening soon in Downtown Toronto and Im already waiting to have it again soon :)
response_from_owner_text: Muhammad, thank you so much for the glowing review. Look forward to seeing you again

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Definitely one of the best burger places Ive  been to in a while. Their burgers are nice and simple and really take you back to the feel of a classic cheeseburger. Simple, juicy and greasy! Their menu keeps it simple as well. It can be found and vonns.com. The Chicken Burgers are MASSIVE. Easily two chicken breasts worth of meat. Ive had a taste of the steak sandwich too and it is pretty good. The portions are massive here and will definitely fill you up. I typically go for a classic if Im not too hungry, a double if Im pretty hungry and a Daredevil (triple patty) if Im feeling dangerous. The Truffle Fries are a MUST try. Soft on the inside, crispy on the outside and paired with their dip is chefs kiss. Regular fries just dont cut it anymore for me. The service is excellent with the staff always friendly and patient waiting to answer any questions you have. The place has great decor that appears to change seasonally as well as a very clean interior with plastic dividers. They have a covered outside area and some indoor seating and the location is less than a 2 minute walk from the beach. Definitely a must try when you are here!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I was shook by how amazing the food tasted. Especially the chicken burgers. Everything was so delicious. The first bite won us over. The helpers in the restaurant were super kind. I was impressed by my first visit.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Double chicken burger was killer. A lil heavy on the breading but that was the biggest chicken burger I have ever seen in my life, I almost couldnt finish it and that alone shocked me lol coming back next time Im around for a triple smash

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: This place is amazing! From the food to the ambiance to the service, everything is top-notch. Perlin, our server, was fantastic! Its obvious that making costumers happy is their top priority. The food is quite tasty (see pictures). They made us feel welcomed and provided us with an incredible time. Highly recommended.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the awesome review. Very happy to see you ve heard a pleasant experience with us. We hope to see you again

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Best HALAL spot for burgers and steak in downtown Vancouver! My family and I are visiting from Toronto and we were recommended to try Vonn s and the food did not disappoint! We ordered the Steak Frites and the steak was cooked so well - it was juicy and perfect. The rocket fries appetizer was fulfilling but also really good, definitely something to order if you have a large party and need an appetizer to share. The XD burger was so fresh! Even the chicken tenders were so good! The food is phenomenal! Definitely a spot to check out if you re in the Vancouver area! Its right in front of a beach waterfront too so the views are nice and the area is great to walk around.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: TOP MF TIER BRO Visiting Vancouver for one week and we had to come back a second time because it s THAT GOOD. Everything s halal too which is This time around we got the birria tacos which were a 10/10 but last time we got burgers, which was also a 10/10. I highly recommend the truffle fries

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Very warm welcome. Big smiles and seated right away. First time however am always quick with the menue and so we got to put in our orders really quick too   and omg. Look at those pictures. Please tag me in your post

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Vonns is by far the best place to eat in Vancouver! I am not lying. The Top Gun Seriously Get That.! Amazing atmosphere  and the Employees and Owner are soo nice Knowlegable! place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Heard a lot about Vonns and totally loved the taste! It was filling! We took takeout as we were on bike but I would recommend to dine in to avoid soggy burger! Next time would def dine in and try their Van-famous steak!!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: My family and I were vacationing in Vancouver and decided to eat at this place based off reviews online. Once there since we were a larger party we had to wait for a table however, we were educated on the menu and what they are known for. My husband and I shared the chicken sandwich and a classic cheesesteak! WOW! Not only were the portions huge but they were AMAZING!! My 1 year old and 3 year old shared the chicken strips and ate almost all of it! That s how much they loved it! Everything is freshly cooked and so tasty! The owner checked on us and made sure everything was to our liking! I definitely recommend stopping here!! It is also perfect walking distance to the beach!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for coming by. We hope you have a safe trip back to the states

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: had lunch there with my bf as he recommended it and I was surprised how much I love the food and how fresh the food was. Also the servers were really nice and friendly! Definitely a must try if you love chicken or food in general. It s also Halal certified so bonus for that

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Delicious food. We ordered the Vonns special cheese steak and the classic chicken burger. Both were amazing, and tasted so fresh. The service was also super quick and awesome. Our server was very friendly and we got our food a lot faster than we expected. The prices are also fair and the portions are great. Would highly recommend this halal burger joint.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Vonns is magical I loved the ambiance of the restaurant and the food is really mesmerizing top notch their burgers are so delicious and juicy I couldn t believe it. Especially their truffle fries are something else I haven t tasted this type of fries anywhere and to top it off it s HALAL

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Best HALAL fast genuine food in Vancouver!! Burgers/  Steaks/  Fries & truffles Fries and more! Just W0W!! Keep up the good work guys!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I ordered online. The food was very tasty and absolutely filling. The truffle fries were more slices of potato to me, yet very delicious.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Great halal food, absolutely amazing location. Both our orders, the burger and the cheesesteak sandwich were tasty and we absolutely devoured it. Our server Sherry was really nice and kind as well. Will definitely eat here again

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I was so pleasantly surprised dining in a walk by last week- the flavors on the cheesesteak , truffle fries & quesadilla were great- nice spice level, came out super hot & not too salty   great portion size too. Staff was friendly & engaging  i hope they can expand soon! Will be back asap!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Its our first time to try this restaurant and the food was amazing. We ordered mushroom swiss burger & phillysteak sandwich combo with truffle fries and its delicious. The truffle fries is highly recommended. Yummy! No wonder why there is always a line up. We will definitely come back with my family. Staff are very friendly and accommodating too!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: What are you doing if you haven t tried Vonns? Seriously the best food! worldly people and service! Amazing vibe and atmosphere! And the view is just phenomenal. To eat in here is a blessing. 10/10 recommend :)

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: This place live up to the hype hands down, the freshest, most delicious ever fast food on the streets of Vancouver. Welcoming, efficient and professional staff added a lot to the experience. Vonns would make your sweetheart melt.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Surprised. That a steak sandwich has better steak than a standalone steak at other restaurants. The ribeye steak was incredibly tender. And you get a lot of it (1.5 steaks?) stuffed into one sandwich. Need to start a new paragraph to talk about the truffle fries, which were amazing. Cut like thick chips. Thickly crispy on the outside, soft in the middle. Dressed in a truffle parmesan sauce. This was close to the best fries/chips Ive ever had, and Im a connoisseur. Even the salad is worth mentioning as it had a tasty dressing with crispy (fried garlic?) topping. Only complaint is the price. $19 for the steak sando.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I had the classic burger but let me tell you it was delicious   everything on it was so good!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Great portions, super friendly staff and an amazing vibe. Must try place if you re looking for a nice spot with beach view Food : 5/5

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Simply one of the best in the city. They used to not smash their burger and it was insane but they were forced to smash all of them or something, still, 5 star burgers. The chicken fingers, you have to get them hot and fresh right away, are literally the best in the world. No seriously, they are simply incredible. Delicately juicy but with the perfect thin crunch, unbelievable. For fries go with the truffle fries, bomb, they also make for great munchie chips for later. (They keep in the fridge overnight, which is not possible to say about regular french fries). I still need to try the cheesesteaks etc., but i wont be able to resist the chicken fingers again next time i order out, i cook a lot at home and know my spots, this is one of a very select few that are at the top of the list. Order up the whole menu, and enjoy.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Review Spoiler Alert: Best Halal Burger in BC! Firstly, kudos to brother Zuhair for his amazing service. We went close to the closing time, and the restaurant was packed but he made sure we had our food before they close for the night. Vonns serve undoubtedly the most flavorful items. We tried the double patty beef burger and the Vonns special cheesesteak. The patties of the burger were juicy enough, and cooked to the perfection. The bun was soft but not soggy. The fries complimented the burger and made the meal wholesome. The cheesesteak was equally delicious. Will we visit this restaurant again? Of course, whenever we have the cravings for burger, this will be our place to go.
response_from_owner_text: You re too kind  thank you so much for your kindness and we hope to see you soon

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Amazing burger, the best one I had in Vancouver. The fries were also really good. Overall was an excellent meal. Service is very efficient and friendly. Great location as well. Have nothing negative to say about this place.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: The BEST Ive eaten since my arrival in Vancouver a year ago  awesome!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Was waiting in line for this amazing Halal restaurant when the owner himself stopped by and had a genuine conversation with each and every customer. You can tell he and his staff have a massive amount of love for the food they make and the people they serve. The Birria Tacos were the best I ve ever had, with the meat being so tender and juicy! A must for anyone visiting the area, cannot think of a better spot to eat.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Ive been looking for a halal steak for more than a year now and finally found the perfect steak. Had the most amazing food there and their truffle fries is must!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: WOW! Best burgers in town! My friend recommended that I try Vonns while I was in Vancouver, and after trying the beef and the chicken burger here I can confirm that this is absolutely one of the best burgers I have had. I highly recommend trying their Nashville Chicken burger, and the truffle fries.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: 4 of us went there last night. 2 of my friends ordered the special XD burger, I ordered steak, and one ordered grilled chicken halloumi burger. Amazing food! One of the greatest hospitalities I have ever seen! I think it was the owner himself going around, welcoming and talking about the specials to every guests on every table. When he heard that it was our first time dining in at Vonns, he suggested that we dont take combos with each meal but get one dish to share and when we chose truffle fries, he said they will ne on the house! He made sure to take our feedback after we finished eating (we couldnt exactly finish those large portions, so we had to pack up the leftovers!). My steak was medium instead of the rare medium that it was supposed to be (it still tasted great!). The man apologized profusely for this tiny mistake and did not charge me for my entire meal and made me promise that I visit a second time for the perfect buttery medium rare steak. I never messaged because it felt like ripping off a small business. But when I posted a review on Facebook, they messaged me themselves with the voucher for free meals for 2. They really make you feel special! Thank you Vonns for making our first visit (potentially of many) an excellent experience! They deserve more than 5/5! P.S. their new XD burger is totally worth the hype!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Such a wonderful place! We ordered classic burger & original chicken burger and bother were so delicious, the fries also is freshly made and so yummy. place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I love the food here. Very big portion sizes,  the aesthetics of the restaurant are great, and located close to English Bay. Great Halal food spot!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Even with the place slammed they waitresses managed to serve us swiftly and paid extra attention to everyone s orders to make sure they got it right. place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: The food is unique delicious just like the service everything with a smile if youre in Vancouver and you havent come here you havent you havent visited Vancouver

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: This is the spot. Massive portions, tastes phenomenal, great vibes and its halal. Cant go wrong. This is the spot.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Absolutely amazing. The food was truly amazing. Must try their truffle fries. Can guarantee you wont be satisfied with one plate. Additionally the burger and the Philly Cheese steak sandwich, just delicious. I thanked the chef and staff on my way out as well as it was so good! Customer service is also excellent

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: This place is amazing! I had the beyond burger and truffle fries which were delicious. The service was great too, the servers are also great and always efficient, happy and polite. I recommend to everyone! I would like to come back here again and again.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I went to Vonns Denman today Noon, we dropped there around 3 pm, the restaurant was full and there was people waiting outsied to enter as well. I ordered the XD Burger, my son & my husband ordered the Classic burger. Their Burger was the best burger ever. We enjoyed our meals, th burger was so juicy and fresh. The quality and quantity was more than awesome. The staff was really friendly and work hard to help everyone. We will revisit again for sure. We were so happy to visit such a good restaurant as Vonns . Thank you for the great job. Keep it up

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I have been here twice now, ordering for takeout both times, and both experiences have been great. This most recent visit we were kindly greeted and helped by Dipika. She was so personable, genuine and helped make our experience pleasantly memorable, all while just simply ordering and taking food to go. They kindly allowed us to try their truffle fries and I feel they were generous towards us. The classic burgers, regular fries and truffle fries were all very tasty. Thank you for another great experience! God bless you and your team

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Such a cute and cosy setting. Excellent food and excellent service. The owner and staff were super accommodating! We got the mushroom swiss burger along with a plate of truffle fries Both were 10/10!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Probably one of my favourite spots in downtown. The vibe, the service and most importantly, the food is good. Only thing to watch out for would be how busy it gets and you could end up waiting 1 hour for a seat.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Came to Vonns with my extremely picky family after my graduation and the staff/management here absolutely blew us away with their service and food. They were so quick to find us a spot for 9, helpful with the menu since we were a big group ordering many items and accommodated everyone who was vegetarian very kindly and easily. My dad has said a restaurant was delicious only a handful of times and Vonns is now on that list with their exceptional food. Can t wait to come back!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Food was amazing. Halal place right by English bay in Vancouver! We tried there special Philly cheese steak. It was so juicy & fries were amazing too! We loved the service, staff were friendly and the owner was courteous and had a lengthy chat with us in the beginning & end of our meal. The restaurant was beautifully designed and was clean.Great experience would definitely recommend this place to friends & family!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Amazing food. Visiting from Toronto and glad I found this halal burger place! Best truffle fries ever (topgun on the menu is a must try)!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: One of the best places for halal, juicy and flavorful burgers, sandwiches, steaks and more. I ordered the steak and fries (truffle fries) and i have never tasted a more flavorful medium steak. I personally prefer rare but this one was surprisingly juicy and full of flavor. The sauces on the side dis not disappoint either. Definitely a must have for everyone. Highly recommended. Will definitely come again!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I regret not taking pictures of the burgers and the cheesesteak truffle because this was amazing. The classic burger was juicy and with a lot of flavour and the cheesesteak truffle was very juicy as well, definitely recommend this if you re looking for those two dishes

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Amazing Burgers, awesome new little place downtown. Everything was really good quality, service was decently quick and friendly, and decor was awesome. Love the setup and the way the wall opens up giving it a nice vibe especially when the sun is out. Definitely a must try!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: MUST TRY!!!!!!! the food here was unreal. So delicious and fresh. The staff were also very friendly and I loved the aesthetic. Best Buffalo chicken sandwich I think I ve ever had 10/10. And they have great tasting unique sodas - try the passion fruit!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: This Sunday , 16th September we as a family went to Vonn around 8:30 pm in the night . The restaurant was full of patrons and we had to wait more than 25 minutes . There was a miscommunication on the part of the host server so we were not happy for the wait . Any way the owner , Mr. Juhaer understood our frustration . He apologized . The food was as usual delicious and the final twist of the evening was the owner refused to take the payment and even declined to allow me to pay the tips . My wife was pleasantly embarrassed with the owner s goodwill gesture . We profusely thanked him for the hospitality . We prayed from the core of our heart for continued blessings and success  of the owner . Highly recommended the cuisine , professional attitude .

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Gave me the best steak experience I have ever had in my life thus far. This place has phenomenal service, outstanding food, incredible scenery and is overall an amazing place to eat. Vonns has perfected that feeling of eating good food.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: I was in town with family for only 4 days and the food was sooo delicious that I couldnt resist to visit Vonns twice in 3 days. Classic burger was our favorite and it is one of the best one on the menu. Super juicy beef patty with their signature sauce, the burger is one of the best we ever had. We also tried Birria Tacos which had super soft beef and flavorful broth. Excellent food. Service is exceptional! We would love to visit this place in the future.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: This place was amazing, we went on New years. It was pretty busy, but not too crowded. The burgers there are huge and looked soo delicious. We ordered the new launched steak. Its called steak frites. Its not on the menu yet, it was super yummy! I would recommend it anytime. They normally make the steak medium, then u can have it with fries or the potato slices thing, forgot what its called, and it comes with sauces its so good. The steak was so soft and tender. Its halaal too, for those who need to know...It was delicious, it comes with ketchup and chipotle sauce and garlic sauce. Parking is on the street, so stones becomes difficult to find. Staff are very friendly. The meat runs out, so call in before you come to check if they are open and still have their meat. I would recommend it anytime and would go again anytime!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Vonns burgers in Vancouver is the one-stop-shop for burger lovers in the city! Ive always been on the hunt for the perfect smash burger, and I can confidently say that Vonns has nailed it. From the juicy patty to the perfectly melted cheese, everything is cooked to absolute perfection. I cant recommend Vonns burgers enough - its simply the best smash burger around! So if youre a burger fanatic like me, make sure you pay them a visit. Your tastebuds will thank you for it!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Everything was cooked quickly and was delicious. Its a bit pricey for standard fare, but very tasty. If you want good food, this can give you some.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken

They offer about 5 different dip options if you ask for them!

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: What a great overall experience. I wish I took a picture of the layout in the restaurant. The doors fully open so you feel as though you re sitting outside even when you re inside. Food was excellent. Had the truffle cheese steak. I added jalapenos and it made it perfect. From the meat to the veggies and the special sauce they put on it the whole meal was great. I will definitely go back. The location is one that is extremely convenient for when you re on the beach and want a quality burger or cheese steak. It s a stones throw from English bay.

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: this place was amazing! all halal options and they had a pretty good menu so we had a hard time choosing but ended up getting their famous chicken sandwich. the portion is huge and food is very filling. the waiters were super friendly and very nice which made the waiting time go by very fast. thank you to the waiters. definitely a must go place

place_name: Vonns Vancouver Smash Burgers and Cheesesteak | Smash Burgers | Shakes | Cheesesteak | Nashville Fried Chicken
review_text: Very polite staff and excellent customer service. The place is very warm and calming. Plus, what was something that was really interesting to me was that you could pay after your meal. ****A very special feature for me was that all the food served at this restaurant was halal.**** The staff recommended the double cheeseburger combo (fries and soda can extra 4$) and it s absolutely delicious. Overall this place was in a very nice location with a nice theme and I recommend this nice restaurant to everybody
Best burger place in town. The flavours are amazing and the meat is juicy and delicious. The staff is friendly and the ambience is great. Must visit!
Everything about the burger here was perfect and tasted like a home made burger. Everyone, give it a try and you probably wont regret it. Food
Excellent burger im from Montreal and next time I come back to this area, I will definitely come back. Thank you Vera

Great place, Vancouvers best burger for sure. Friendly staff, and always helpful. This is a place I will always return to when Im in the city. Cant miss.

Even the sauces like chipotle & BBQ are terrific & taste homemade (IDK if they are). Cant recommend the lamb & G-Money burgers highly enough. Shakes are great too.
Google was right - best burgers in town! Fresh meat, and the fries were perfection. And a reasonable cost!

The saying goes - Veras Meat cant be beat! They definitely have the tastiest burgers. The Canuck is my favourite, with side of onion rings. So so good ! Cajun burger is a killer !

Ruby was amazing all night long! She has always been the best every time I come. She takes care of everybody every time I am here. She is the best and I would 10/10 recommended this place. Wheelchair accessibility: Main floor. No ramps or stairs. Washroom is accessible.

I really like this burger restaurant. The burgers are home made and still hand pressed. I ordered the double burger and there was so much meat that I had to deconstruct the burger to eat it. The toppings were fresh and the onion rings were amazing. I definitely recommend this place.

This is my favourite burger joint! I love the double BBQ burger with yam fries and beer! The owner is always working hard and provides the best customer service!
Best burgers in the town... Love their burgers, milkshakes and jalapeno bottle caps.

Totally awesome food and super friendly and down to earth staff. Also, as someone who is allergic to gluten, their gluten free bun is totally killer! Burger, fries, or shakes, everything I ve had here has always been super delicious, flavourful and fresh tasting. I live nearby and have been many times. It can be a touch pricey, but the quality of the food reflects the cost. Fantastic place to get a delicious, no frills, burger and beer, shake, or soda. I have faith that if you decide to pay them a visit they won t let you down!

review_text: Had the chance to eat here this evening, after walking by many times, and was absolutely blown away by the meal we had. The burger was absolute perfection; cooked perfectly and incredibly flavourful. Just an amazing meal, cannot recommend highly enough.

Miss Ruby is the queen of maintaining the atmosphere at Vera s on the late night shifts and watching that woman WORK is so inspiring !!!! She is true community icon in the Davie street village!!! Loveeeeeee Vera s on Davie~

I left my umbrella here once and they kept it in the back for me until I returned and could pick it up. Thank you so much Veras you make me feel so loved and so safe. I love you Ruby, you are so kind and so kind to me and my friends. Come here!!! Vegetarian options: Love it!!! Tasty
Good quality burgers
One of the best burger i ever had made with love from the lovely owner and her son its really amazing and taste sooo good

We recently had a less than wonderful burger experience somewhere else, and wanted to make up for it, and so came here on a recommendation. Fantastic. We all ate too much after enjoying our food, which is always the best indication of good comfort food. I enjoyed a massive burger with double most things and added deep fried jalapenos, also had a side of fries, more jalapenos, and poutine and a shake. All hit the spot - burger was juicy and cooked fresh, fries crisp, and I ended up only eating a quarter of my poutine because my kids fought over the rest and didn t share. Both kids say they would return, and their only complaint was the food was so good the ate until they felt ill. Serves them right. A bit more expensive than your regular fast food place, or their that other burger place down the street, but it s worth it. Money well spent, and time enjoyed.

Staff was super friendly and burgers were amazing! Had the chicken burger and beef burger; the chicken was huge and the beef burger was grrrrreat! Love the pride decorations as well. We definitely want to come back again.
Best burger place indeed ... fresh and tasty and excels in service .. great job ruby
Veras is awesome as always. Covid protocols followed. Juicy burgers couldnt ask for more.
Great burgers, great workers but this place seriously needs a reno.

I decided to get to get the Baja Burger, and it happens to be one of the best burgers I have ever had. On this un-expected journey I stumbled across this burgerjoint as well as the this gem named Ruby. She provided the best customer service as well as this recommendation- the baja burger! Vegetarian options: Sub any burger to veggie burger with no charge Dietary restrictions: Lettuce wrap, customizable burger options! Wheelchair accessibility: Very open no stairs

Great burger selection very tasty food. Open until 4am. Deep fried jalapenos are really good as well. Everyday during the week there is a promotion on each burger. The attention was great from the 2 staff members. Its amazing how they run all that operation only with 2 people. You can also have shots of tequila and beer and get absolutely hammered right beside other bars at a way cheaper price. Always recommended to visit Veras burger
It was really really good, Your burgers with fried egg so delicious
Came at 10 for a burger before clubbing. The vera burger was perfect, not too oily, very flavorful and fries the same. Very chill with good music volume. Highly recommend:)
Are you kidding me? Ruby gave us the best service and burger we have ever had in Vancouver. This place is a must visit for anyone stopping in   a davie street essential !

We love it here! Incredible Service that always feels like home. We grab dinner here regularly and hv tried most of the items on the menu. Our favourites are the the onion rings, poutine & Buffalo Chicken burger. So good!! We have also ordered it via Uber Eats and it came super fast. The onion rings r fresh and crispy. The fries and poutine are delish. Lots of gravy and cheese. The Buffalo chicken has a sauce on it that is awesome. Not too spicy but just enough kick to give it an amazing flavour. The best thing about this spot, when going in person, is the service. The ladies who work here are very family oriented in the sense that they are personable and remember you when you return. Its really nice to have that special personable service in a city that can sometimes leave you feeling invisible :-) We will keep coming back here...hopefully for a long long time <3

Vera s Burgers are the best in the City!!! Quality ingredients, fabulous beef patty and great fixings! Onion rings are fabulous as well. Fries are generously proportioned. A regular go-to in the West End!

Uber eats charged us for an order even though we cancelled over 45 minutes before it was due for delivery. When we spoke to the owner, Ruby, at this location,  she went above and beyond to make sure we were satisfied. She made our meals on the house and they tasted great. We had the buffalo chicken burger, and the lamb burger with fries and onion rings. All top quality. When management is kind and treats their customers well, it s good to support those kinds of places. Will be back for sure.
Veras is always the best place to go. The food is amazing. And not to mention ruby and sandy are the best. If you ever have the opportunity to see them, they will make your meal memorable.

This is an amazing Veras joint I know theres many of them around but this one downtown not only whenever I call. ...  I cant even get through half of my order before she knows who I am and she remembers exactly what I got last time. Always with a friendly voice and when I arrive asks me how I am and I feel more like a friend than just a place that I go to eat. One time they missed my gravy and I went back up there and she gave me another gravy on top of the one that I purchased and a gift certificate. She has amazing customer service I see her working all the time shes a very hard worker and anyone that could ever write a bad review I would never take seriously. With so many burger joints around downtown I will always go to Veras. Thank you for the amazing service and the amazing food.
The best burger joint in town. Came here after clubbing and the food was delicious and the service was outstanding. Will come here again. Highly recommend this place.
Expensive but worth it. The Frank burger, a beef patty with a frankfurter and the usual suspects is so tasty. Tip: asked to double patty and paid $21 for it inc tax. Food

This place is fantastic, the lady running it had to be one of the hardest working people I know. I used to go here for pickups only and when I was under pressure I used to get mad about waiting so we had kind of a rough patch. Everythings cool now bc I was being impatient and I realize it takes time to make good food. And these burgers are the schizz bizz. Also thanks to vivid we can now take out alcohol with our orders. Im working my way through the whole menu of burgers and I suggest you do the same.
Spectacular! You make the best burgers in the city!

The woman working the closing shift at Davie on 420 has the patience and care of a saint. 130am full of all obnoxious types, not an eye batted AND she also came out to my table to make sure I wanted mayo. Lamb burger was incredible, but not as incredible as this lady. Fantastic and lovely human being   thank you so much!
BBQ burgers are delicious and the onion rings were so good that we ordered more! Ruby took great care of us and we ll be back!

Came here at 11:30pm on a Wednesday, only one girl working. She has a fantastic attitude, was HUSTLING, cooking and doing all transactions on her own. The food was DELICIOUS, I got the lamb burger and my girlfriend got the Vegetarian Cajun burger. The fries with the vegetarian gravy were amazing also. I never leave reviews but felt it necessary here for sure. Incredibly impressed. Would recommend to anyone.
Great burgers. Place could be cleaner lol

Pricy BUT delicious. Once awhile strategy to taste food around. We had only burgers which is cost more than $12 but it s worth it. We would love to try it again when we visit Vancouver. Would be great if they have variety of bun choices such as whole grain or gluten free.
The burgers did not disappoint! Tasted 100% homemade; the shakes were just as delicious, and the staff was super friendly. Will definitely return.
Great burger, freshly made and full of flavour. Not overdone with whacky sauces.

Just finished a baja burger and it was delicious! Been coming to this location for the past 4 years and always a pleasant experience! review_text: After a day of running all around Vancouver before a meeting, I was really craving a burger.  A really good burger.  A spectacular and indulgent burger. Yelp saves me in these situations, so I did a search and headed over to Veras.  Parking was really easy to find on the street.  (Side note: I love parking in Vancouver because it is so easy to do with credit cards.  The flashing green traffic lights I still dont understand...)  I got a little nervous about the outside because the awning is ostentatious and still doesnt really stand out compared to what is next to it, but then I went inside. With hockey playing on four screens, this feels like a very Canadian way of eating a burger, but somehow it doesnt feel too sports-bar-like.  Clean and open, it is easy to read the menus and order.  The cashier was very friendly and told me she would bring the food to me. I ordered sweet potato fries and they were perfect; both crispy and hot. This is a rarity for sweet potato fries, which I can never figure out.  If they have good breading, they arent hot; if they are hot, they dont taste good.  Somehow, Veras pulled it off. The burger was also great. I ordered the works and pulled a few things off because it was so big.  A very sweet, gruff-voiced attendant (possibly the owner) checked on me to see if they needed to fix the order, although it was perfect.  He checked on me at the end, too.  The entire time I was eating, he was constantly cleaning and taking care of tables.  Really incredible service and attention. I am over-the-top impressed.

Best burgers I have ever had in my life!! The fries and chicken wings are the best I ve ever had to! Staff is amazing, so friendly, the cook is very friendly. This is now a location I ll always visit when in Vancouver! Great place.

I ordered two patties on the burger and, even though I made sure to finish, it was a lot of food. I think Ill order just one patty next time. But hot dang this is an amazing burger place. The person running store was just awesome: friendly and welcoming. She even checked on us after we got our food. She made the experience.

review_text: One, if not the best burger in Vancouver, is really good and tasty! Only problem is the limited seats in location.

Hundy has been on my radar since their soft opening. I sat at home watching their instagram stories of people snapping photos of their burgers and fries. Yesterday night, I had enough, it was time to try out Hundy. First impressions, the music playlist really sets the vibe of the whole place. I love how they converted this place into a restaurant at night and a coffee shop by day. I also like that the take my phone number and text me when my table is ready approach. It s a counter service restaurant (like PDX restaurants) so while we waited for our table we ordered beers. Their beers are constantly changing but I had the Farmhouse 33 Acres experiment beer and it was amazing. It s a very refreshing IPA without too many hops and fruity flavours. Alright, 4th paragraph in, I should start talking about the food. I ordered the bacon cheese burger with fries. The sauce in the burger is what makes this burger amazing. It s hard to explain what it is, but their secret sauce is boss. Bun, patty, veg, and cheese were all great sidekicks in this burger. But, the true Robin to the Batman were the fries. These fries  their like my crown jewel of fries  places like Cockney Kings and other OG fish and chips places. You think you come here for the burger, but when you leave  the fries are what you think about. My buddy Bryan ordered the bacon poutine with a chicken burger. I tried the poutine and must say it was worth the $7. As for his review of the chicken burger, he said,  I ll be back. . Once I posted the pics on IG, the DMs exploded with,  How was it?   Is the hype real?

review_text: Long story short: definitely give this place a try. Place has 4.9 for a reason! It was a cold dark rainy night (seriously, sept 24, 8pm, it was raining). My partner and I were standing outside the omelettery, puzzled by the burger sign, as we tried to open up the qr code menu on our phones. The owner, Sina, flung open the front door and welcomed us to look at the menu inside. He then took us on a journey on how his burger ingredients were sourced, prepared and served. All of which, was brimming with excitement and passion. You could really tell Sina was really proud of what he and his team were slinging. His pitch made us forget we were walking over from having dessert. We had to try one, even though we were full. We got the juicy original burger, and we enjoyed it next to our car, under the lights of a carpet store. So I cant say for sure how well it holds up for delivery or long transport. The beef: smash-seared perfectly. Not too thin that you get jerky. Smashed enough so you get a crisp meaty crust but the center is still juicy. The bun: airy, light, not soggy or falling aparty. The caramelized onions: slowly cooked to a perfect unrushed jammy perfection. Will definitely be back to try the other more hefty burgers!

*Inside Paul s Omelettery* This smashburger is absolutely insane - 10/10 and even better that it s Grass Fed, Grass Finished, and never frozen so the flavor is incredible. We re visiting from SF on our way to Whistler and saw the high rating on Google. The people there could not be more lovely and I can t recommend enough. I got the lettuce wrapped cheeseburger with carmelized onions (carmelized for 12-24 hours) with bacon and it was perfection. They re open from 5pm-1am and it s pick-up or delivery only. We will be returning on our way back from Whistler!

The carefully selected, locally sourced ingredients, the meticulous manner in which each culinary element worked in concert to create a definitively delectable and singularly scrumptious consumption experience, and ultimately the marvellous man behind the magical sandwich all helped to remind me that there are so many things to live for. To live is to aspire to lofty goals and then pursue them with as much tenacity as kindness. With as much fierce perseverance as brotherly understanding. With all your mind and all your heart. Every time I dined here I ve thought,  Man it s the best burger I ve ever had.  But it continues every visit! Def an underrated spot
Really tasty smash burgers and super duper nice service!!
Amazing service . The cook came out of the restaurant and handed me my order as I was still parked in the car . Above and beyond .Highly recommend.

Excellent service, best hamburgers done to perfection and exactly as ordered,  friendly attendant and cooker, they bring the food to the table, great location,  well kept restaurant, good crowd, well recommended.
The burger was great. Even better the gentleman running the place was friendly and professional. Have not been there in many years but will definitely go back again soon.

Friendly place and good burgers. The people working there were nice and the seats inside were comfy. What appeals to me the most is their wide selection of burgers. I tried the stinger which has jalapenos in it and gives it a spicy zing to it. Ill come again to try the other special burgers they have.
My hamburger was very nice and  juice,  so happy that I didnt wait in line also was very quiet,  cashier and cook polite and friendly they worked so nice as a team keep it up guys

My Buddy and I went to Veras last Friday night  and ordered 2 Vera combos,  one double and one single. Best burger Ive had in a very long time. The meat was well seasoned and juicy.  Overall, my buddy gave the double cheese burger 10/10. I also give the burger 10/10. The combo comes with fries and eating in a bottomless soda. Large selection of sodas to choose from.  The fries were nothing special,  but the Burger was fantastic.  Will return when the opportunity presents. Cheers!
The food is actually really good, we order a burguers and poutine and the poutine was a really good portion. The attention of the crew was amazing. Food

THE BEST burger in town...hands down! Its our go-to whenever we are craving a good burger. We usually get the original Vera burger and we were never disappointed. Staff at the Main st location are kind and professional and service is quick! Highly recommend this place!
Great burgers!!! Staff is friendly, service is fast, food is fresh, price is good. (Im not crazy about their fries - slightly overpriced).
Taste of burger is amazing and place is not very good but the taste of food is prepared you for good experience.

Ordered for takeout the bacon, mushroom cheese burger with sweet potato fries - delish! Loved how it was still hot when we arrived at our destination.  Also, saw how cool and professional the staff was dealing with a difficult customer. We appreciate your service! Recommend this place.
These burgers are amazing I really also enjoy the service here as you don t get that at most places these days Thanks
I got Classic burger and onion rings from here and it was awsome ! The burger was super tasty and fresh. Highly recommend.

Best burger and fries in Vancouver hands down! Plus staff are great! Will always come back!

Super friendly staff, and even better tasting food! Always made fresh to order and will definitely be back to this place. Highly recommended! Especially the Stinger Burger, if you have a taste for some spicy heat ;))

Perfect fry on the chicken, flavourful buffalo sauce, and a very tasty bun. Was a little expensive, but well worth the quality of the food. Highly recommend this place!

My partner and I tried Veras for the first time the other day and really enjoyed our burgers and fries. Also the owner was working and is really nice. We will for sure go back.

The best service on main street! The guys here were so friendly and kind. Even thought it was only counter service, they made the experience memorable. Would definitely eat here again! A refreshing change from all the restaurants that forget you re even sitting there
