I LOVE VERAS one of my favourite burger places to go

I recently found this place by a friend, and I am so glad. I ve been there two times already, and I ve been loving it. So happy that they have thought about dietary restrictions. From how good their plant based patty is, it really shows that they cared. My burger had everything I d like to have on my burger. I really enjoyed the crush fries and tofu nuggets too! Will go back for sure. It d be lovely if they bring some sour beers too!! Vegetarian options: Yummiest veg burger everrr

Quality veggie burger joint in downtown! Walking into the restaurant, it s an order and pay before eating like a fast food joint. Very clean inside, ambiance is very comforting and the staff was friendly. The person at the till was super helpful with recommendations and I went with all his recommendations. What I ordered: Veggie style Cheese Burger, Single patty (Recommend) $11.50 Combo: Fries and a Orange Milkshake (Recommend) $11 This veggie burger hit all the spots for flavour, their in house sauce laying under fresh tasty veggies and the veggie patty was satisfying, slightly crispy but not greasy in a brioche bun. Highly recommend, the burger was super filling so warning the fries were very tasty as well but it was quite a lot! They fresh cut their fries thin like McDonald s but tastes so much better, crispy, thin and not as greasy. To top off my order I wanted to try their milkshakes. Staff had reco the orange milkshake and what a pleasant surprised that turned out to be! Reminds me of a cream soda orange pop but in a creamy milkshake version! Overall everything was super tasty, I d recommend taking your order to go if you re making it a combo but the burger itself was good enough. I d come back to try their vegan burger with the vegan bun. A little pricey here but tastes like fresh ingredients and quality ingredients, so worth the $27 bill with tip.

Loved our messy, flavorful burgers and shakes. Skip the crush fries (they look better than they taste) they were a messy side with too much sauteed onion. Id recommend one order of fries for two people with a side of the crush sauce to dip. The milkshakes were good. Loved the rootbeer flavor.

Dont want to overhype this place but I left perfectly satisfied.  It had everything I look for in a burger - and I really enjoyed their crush sauce.  It was nice to have something familiar done in a way that felt unique.  Ill definitely come again!

June 2023  this is us truly a finger licking good mess in and around your mouth. Tried the vegan cheese burger and the beef cheeseburger. I was surprised at just how amazing they both were. The vegan one is easily the best vegan burger in town. The cheesy fries were also really good. Won t be long till I come back again.
My favourite burger in the city. Been here 10x in last 2 months. 1. Burger Crush 2. Juicy Joe s (Best Smash Cheeseburger) 3. Between2Buns

Simple menu that works! Delicious burgers with lots of flavour. Their fries were amazing as well, and when asked for some mayo, it was house made! Fresh and quick, I cannot wait for another chance to visit again

Five stars for you Burger Crush! Well done! Burger Crush has a simple menu with veg options and both non and alcoholic beverages. Prices were higher than the Golden Arches or competitors but reasonable given the quality and service. I went with the single patty cheeseburger and fries. Delicious burgers, delicious fries. Perfectly messy. Perfectly cooked burger and fries. Excellent. Presentation was above what you d expect from a burger place. Washrooms were clean, accessible and gender neutral. Dining area was frequently cleaned by staff as soon as people were finished and leaving. I have no complaints and no areas to offer improvements, however, I did visit at 2:00pm on a Friday, your experience may differ depending on timing! Enjoy!
Best veggie burger I ve ever had. They only have 3 burgers on the menu but they don t need more options the veggie burger is so perfect that is enough

I CRUSHED that juicy delicious burger   I loved the vegan orange milkshake! My husband got a regular milkshake and I tried them both, vegan was definitely better as it was a bit less thick and easier to drink. My lactose-intolerant butt appreciates it. I got my burger lettuce wrapped too and I enjoyed every bite! Great service and prompt. Arrived at about 5:30pm on a Wednesday. Will definitely come back
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the review, Deanna! We are so glad you enjoyed dining with us, and we are very appreciative that you took the time to leave us a review. We hope to have you back soon, & be your go-to spot for a lactose free treat!

review_text: Burger crush is amazing! The regular cheeseburger and the veggie style burger are both delicious! The veggie burger is not trying to be meaty, which we appreciate. The tofu nuggets are definitely worth a try, they are crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside. The sauces are also to die for and their gf bun is perfection, you cant even tell its different. Special shout out to Cameron who served us both times we visited. Her customer service is incredible and made our visit extra special.

I had the most amazing veggie burger! Ive been a vegetarian since birth, so I have had my fair share of veggie burgers, and this one is my new favorite. The fries are amazing too. Solid 10/10 Vegetarian options: Vegan and vegetarian options available

Reminds me of InNOut burgers but waay better. I was so full from my single burger and couldnt finish the crush fries. I had the vegan root beer shake and its great to have a shake while being lactose intolerant! Sooo delicious and made with coconut milk.

A simple menu with excellent burgers and fries. Great selection of sodas and alcoholic beverages. The staff is friendly, accommodating, and courteous. I had the double cheeseburger, but asked for it without cheese. The sauce has a slight flavour of cheese, but its just perfect. All in all this was an excellent and filling burger. They have tap water, salt, and pepper upon request. Vegetarian options: Vegan burger, nuggets, and milk shake available.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Cezary! Thanks so much for checking us out! Cant wait to se you again.

review_text: Exactly the vegan restaurant Ive been waiting for! The Veggie Classic burger and Vegan Nuggets was amazing, and the Rootbeer milkshake (non-vegan version) was perfect. Service was excellent, prices reasonable and lots of comfortable seating. I will probably be back here at least once a week.
Great tasting vegan burger! Tofu nuggets were great AND you can get milkshakes vegan as well.
This is a place I crave.  So I have to go regularly.  The single cheese and crush fries always hit. Staff is always super friendly, love them. Food

My daughter found Burger Crush online with awesome reviews so we made it just in time for a late dinner. Ordered the single cheeseburger with fries and ginger ale. The burger was amazing! Fresh ground beef, cooked toppings with amazing flavour and the bun exquisite!! A must try!! Even the gingerale had a unique taste better than the regular. Will visit again ;)

Ive been disappointed too many times when having/ordering burgers in Vancouver, until Burger Crush! I just finished having it for the first time and can easily say its the best burger Ive had in the city yet!! The fries are so good too and such a great portion!
Each bite is an explosion of flavor that leaves you craving more. Top-notch service   they totally nailed the burger game!

Amazing service here! I love the vibes, and the food. The burgers are reasonably priced and they tasted amazing! My partner was extra hungry and asked them if they could add a third patty lol. after a short exchange between the kitchen team, they said they d be able to do it! 10/10, ill definitely come again :) i hope more locations open up and i hope the prices stay the same!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Alyse, thank you so much for taking the time to review us! So glad to hear you enjoyed your experience & we hope to welcome you back again soon!

review_text: If you like a no bull**** burger, finger licking messy, flavorful, and a mouth full of guilty pleasure, then this is the place to go. The price ranges from $11 to $14.5 for burger depending on your appetite. Your fries, shakes, etc vary from $5 to $9.50. Good music and plenty of seating. Not recommended for a first date unless you are comfortable showing off your messy eating skills .

I enjoyed their double cheeseburger, vegan nuggets, crush fries and chocolate vegan shake. It was one of best cheeseburger I have ever tried. Everything was worth for the price. I would definitely give five star for their friendly staff. I highly recommend this place for juicy burgers.
Great spot for a vegan burger. Also had the tofu nuggets and the vegan root beer shake. All delicious

This burger place is my new favorite! I am celiac and they were able to cater to my needs. Their gluten free bun is top notch, but also the burger itself- the toppings were great, the crush sauce was different and fantastic, the patty hot and delicious! Great portion for what you re paying too. I highly recommend this place.

5 stars for consideration to customers from staff! Paris and team greeted us in store yesterday, we love the food here and had mentioned an item was missing from our last order, with no expectations of anything, the burger and shake are so good we went again to eat either way and would have continued to do so. Paris immediately comped our order this time and apologized. Again, no expectations and insisted he not but did so anyways - which was so kind of him. The staff kept saying we want to keep our customers happy. Super important and just adds to the amazing experience here. Fully recco this place- I ve had in and out and I ve had shake shack and this place lives up to the hype! We had it twice in one week -  .
The BEST vegan milk shakes in the world. Burgers are huge. Even the vegan ones. Staff are very sweet.

I ordered the gluten free bun with a regular patty & vegan cheese & sauce. This is the best burger I have ever eaten. I have a gluten & dairy allergy & they were very accommodating! Dietary restrictions: They were very accommodating with my gluten & dairy allergy!
Cute diner vibe, friendly staff and amazing vegan options! Best vegan milkshake I ve had since I went vegan!

Super chill spot. This place deserves thanks for making a fast food veggie burger that actually tastes like fast food (anyone who doesnt use a brioche bun for a veg burger is just trying to poison you). And that root beer shake was amazing. If youre into tofu those nuggets are pretty much the best veg ones Ive ever had. Vegetarian options: Good for veggies and vegans.
The double cheeseburger is excellent! In-n-Out style but not as fast-food-ish. The Crush Fries are also very good. Overall everything was really fresh and delicious. I ll be back! Food : 5/5 |
Double burger and fries for half the price of the usual chain restaurants in Vancouver!  Plus they have beer!

Stopped in on a random night with a craving for a good burger and was absolutely blown away! The menu is short but the burgers taste gourmet, great portions for the prices. Definitely wish we had visited sooner!
The place is very clean and bright. The menu is very simple which is what I prefer. The burgers were excellent. Very tasty and with fresh ingredients.
Absolutely amazing. Usually gluten free buns taste like chalk and cardboard combined, but the gluten free bun was awesome. Excellent chocolate shake too. Easily my fav burger place in Vancouver
The burger was so juicy and delicious. Crush fries not so much. I will go back for the burgers.
Great smashed burgers! Loved the fries too!

Best burger in the city. Smaller menu means fresh and great tasting food every time. Very consistent. Love the vegan cheese and GF options. Thank you!! Dietary restrictions: Vegan and Gluten free friendly
Delicious vegetarian and vegan options! The vegan milkshake is my favourite!

Crush Burger is an absolute gem when it comes to burgers. Their offerings are simply mouthwatering, with juicy patties, flavorful toppings, and perfectly toasted buns. The quality and taste are unmatched, making Crush Burger a must-visit for any burger lover. Simply delicious!
Very yummy burgers and so similar to Shake Shack! Will definitely be back.
Vegan and vegetarian burger, plus vegan nuggets and vegan milk shakes. Good prices and quickly served. Vegetarian options: A vegan patty available, plus vegan nuggets and shakes
Not sure which ingredient does it, but burger tastes so great! For sure coming back again. Recommended!

My first time and I enjoyed their Double Bacon cheeseburger. It is a good size burger, the quality of the patty, cheese and bun were excellent. The Crush fries were okay. The mix of the salt from the fries and the sauce was a bit too strong but did like the melted cheese on the fries. Orange milkshake was good too, could use a bit more orange flavour. Ill be back, the burger was legit!
LOOOVE this place! Delicious burgers and fries. Kind staff members. Very clean. A must try!

The sauce is kinda like the Big Mac sauce, and I know that they generously salt and caramelize they Patties, and the brioche bun acts as the perfect blanket for this flavour bomb, but I still don t understand how it can be so good. Someone had commented that it s like Mac Donald, it s not that s dumb.

Comparable to in and out but less grease. Would definitely go back 10/10. Vegetarian options: I am trying to go meatless and I was happy to have been able to try their simple but flavorful Vegan burger. Kid-friendliness: The staff was extremely attentive to the table next to us who had an adorable little one who was playing with trays.
Best burger I ever had! Also love all the vegan veg options! Excellent beer choices.
The cheese burger was juicy and tasted amazing! Good food, would visit again!

Amazing burgers. This has become our regular burger joint because it s just top notch. They don t need a huge menu because what they do, they do well. The vegan options are really good (vegan shake is just as good as the regular one!) and the crushed fries are SO GOOD. Burger sauce is delicious, and the meat is always juicy and flavourful. You don t need to go anywhere else!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review, Leandra! We are delighted to know you enjoyed our offerings, and we hope you will be back!

review_text: Emma was very friendly and professional. Great customer service. My friend and i really really enjoyed our burgers. Light, filling and non-greasy.

One of the best burgers I tried in Vancouver so far! Cannot miss their fries and milkshakes as well. Store was really clean, vibrant and organized. Staff was very helpful and recommended me what to choose. Definitely will visit again!

My god the burger was amazing. Milkshake was delicious. Fries were good but not amazing. Honestly, my wife and I could have shared a fries and burger and our own milkshake and it would have been enough. Great place

Buyers remorse is definitely something we always feel after ordering fast food. Yet somehow, that never stopped us from trying different places haha! We were blown away by the quality of the food! The fries were actually really good, and felt homemade. The burgers were also perfect. They found the perfect recipe to make fast food such an enjoyable experience. I cannot recommend this place enough!

Best burger and dirty fries in Vancouver so far ! Ohhh and try the milkshakes ..delicious , decadent and flavourful. Try to eat in the spot not delivery, truly worthy!

I had lunch with my girlfriend a few days ago, at the location in dt Vancouver. Food is very good! I m not vegetarian but I was surprised by the taste of the veggie burger option. The crush fries are an excellent alternative to the classic poutine. Service was great! Good vibes from the team, especially from the manager Atabey, who assisted us with the choice of our lunch. We had a nice chat and he was very friendly and professional! We will be back!
Thats a good burger. Cheesy onion fries were also solid. I tried the vegan nuggets too and you cant even tell its not chicken. Definitely will be on my short list of go-to burger spots in Vancouver.

My families review: Service was quick, food quality is way more than we were expecting.  Its sit-down quality. Fries are delicious! They have vegan options. Did not try a milkshake, but Im sure they are just as great!
Burgers and vegan strawberry milkshake were amazing... Crush fries were okay. We will definitely be back!
Love love love the vegan options, especially the milkshakes!!! They are a bit more expensive than the regular ones but still decently priced:)
Amazing burgers!!!! One of the best smash burgers Ive ever had. Fresh ingredients, everything well balanced. Made fresh to order. Awesome shakes, thick and flavourful.
The best burger I have ever had, huge portions and the crush fries are so good. Pretty impressive that a burger place also has really good vegan options. Will definitely go back!

I was so excited to try Burger Crush when I heard about the dairy free options! The burgers were on point with amazing burger sauce. The crush fries were saucy and delicious. And to finish it off with a vegan milkshake was the cherry on top! Cant wait to go back! Vegetarian options: Amazing veggie burgers! Dietary restrictions: Vegan options. Kid-friendliness: Kid sized burgers available.
I love their vegan milkshakes, and the vegan burger is top-notch. Havent tried the nuggets yet, but Im looking forward to it. Recommended dishes
Best burgers in town! And the fries are unreal! Great shakes everything is top notch!

I really appreciate that Burger Crush is committed to making all their food in-house which is very noticeable when you eat their food. Juicy burgers to crunchy well seasoned tofu nuggets..... its no wonder that the last three times I was there I had to wait in line that was all the way out the door. The amazing food and very fast and friendly service is why Ill keep coming back.

Easily one of the best (if not the best) burger joints in the lower mainland. The small menu was actually a huge plus for me as it can get overwhelming when you have so many options. They have the classics and the quality is incredible. The burger was cooked perfectly. Id compare it to in-and-out burger but this is honestly way better because the bun doesnt get soggy. Fries are also the best (thin and crispy). Didnt have a shake but they looked delicious, will definitely try one next time Im there. Slightly sad I dont live closer, but slightly relieved because Im sure Id eat this multiple times a week if I did lol
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to review us, Gayani! We are so pleased you enjoyed our menu, and flattered you commuted all that way to give us a try. Your feedback is greatly appreciated, & we look forward to serving you next time you are in the area! :)

review_text: The space is adorable. The music was great. The staff is super friendly. Food was ready in 15 which was exactly what we were quoted. Our cheeseburgers, fries and shakes were perfection. Prices are comparable to any quick service burger shop around. The quality of this place blows those places out of the water IMHO. I would recommend this place to anyone and everyone.
Love this place ! Simple menu, great cheese burgers . The burgers is  grilled to perfection . The buns are soft and goes perfectly with the beef and fixings .   Five stars !
Best burgers I ever tried!! Everything is perfect there: the food, the atmosphere and the customer service. If I could give more than 5 stars I will do it!

One of the best all around burgers I ve had. Great flavour combo for both burger and crush fries. Great price point as well. Like In & Out- similar vibes with similar menu but I think crush does it better.
Went there with my bf, cousin and my aunt and we all got a cheese burger with a side of fries and a soda. We all think it s a 10/10

Excellent lunch. My husband had the double cheeseburger and shake, I had the vegan versions. The food came out piping hot. I cant remember if Ive ever had a hot, fresh take out burger I like. Usually theyre lukewarm. Really, really good!!
response_from_owner_text: We are so glad to hear, Kaylynn! Thank you for dining with us, & taking the time to leave a review :)

review_text: Cheeseburger was good, crush fries were great, and the strawberry milkshake was exceptional!

We hear about burger crush on Instagram and wanted to give it a try. First time in and the food was fast, but also AMAZING! We were also impressed by the Vancouver staff who noticed we were wearing chili peppers t-shirts for the concert and they made a point of playing the music to pump us up! Great staff and great food . If only there was a Kelowna location!
Amazing smash burgers! Weekly staple

Like a dream come true. I never wanted to move to Victoria but I thought I had to after trying burger crush two years ago. I m so happy they have finally opened a Vancouver location. The menus is simple, and simply delicious! If you like crushing a good burger and a shake this is the place for you. Vegan or non, you won t regret giving this place a try. Vegetarian options: Vegan hamburger, milk shakes, and nuggets
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review, Paul! We are delighted to hear you enjoy the menu, & that we could shorten your commute for satisfying a Burger Crush craving! Your continued patronage & feedback is invaluable to our small business; we appreciate it more than you know & we hope to have you back very soon :)

review_text: Great burger and fast service. If you want a dry tasteless brick, this is not the place for you. They ve nailed the right amount of juicy patty with a bun that lasts until you re done eating. I ll keep coming back.

Honestly the best burger I ve ever had!  Great service and love the funky venue. I m not usually a milkshake fan, but they are delicious. This will be a place I spend more time ordering from, for sure!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Lissa! SO glad you enjoyed an cant wait to see you again soon. Scott

review_text: In and out burger, meets shake shack but with options for every diet! I loved the vegan crush fries, tofu nuggets with all the sauces and the root beer coconut ice cream shake. The retro space will make you feel like you are in the diner of saved by the bell!
Best burger and fries ever - maybe in my life.  Highly recommend.
Ok but the grilled bun gives this burger so much extra flavour. That was the stand out to me! Pricey but I m super glad I tried it. Will be a splurge fast food type burger moment in my future.
My favorite burger place in Vancouver with generous price. The zucchini hits the spot The mushrooms are juicy. Their fries also taste great, very big portion. I would recommend to share the fries.
I loved the atmosphere, great for a late afternoon. Good location and service, affordable prices. The burgers are simple, not very tasty, but the poutine is very good.  I recommend!

It was a nice space with young and amiable staff. The pricing was really good! We tried the classic burgers and I even asked for lettuce wrap instead of buns. I definitely recommend it if you want to have an economical experience while being in downtown.
Good vibes, the bacon cheese burger for $12.75 is tasty and good value. A lot of burger for the price. Meat is a bit salty though.
response_from_owner_text: Hi William. Thank you so much for the lovely comments I will ask the kitchen staff to keep an eye on the salt.

review_text: This place was fantastic. Our server was fantastic, and our burger was divine. Everything tasted fresh and well-seasoned. I couldnt have asked for a better experience. The people at the door saying hi and helping us to seating is a nice touch
Delicious burger, quick service and friendly staff. Really, really good burger. Great prices. Am visiting the city but will be back here.
Pleasant atmosphere  nice and friendly staff and very tasty food! Highly recommended!

Arrived from the UK a little jetlagged and looking for a quick meal. Service was the best weve had in years(UK service is not that great we know). We both had the Bacon Cheeseburger, that was pretty amazing! Best Burgers weve ever had. The Chit Chat larger also was a refreshing beer after what had become a long day!. Were not on the city long so doubtful we will get chance to visit again, but if were ever back will be on the must do list!.

Weve been looking for the perfect burger for a while now and none can be found in Yaletown! We arrive early while there were still plenty of tables outside. I was tempted by the Chit Chat burger but didnt really want to handle a runny egg. We ordered two classics with grilled zucchini. Yum. The beef was perfectly cooked, succulent and for a change, the patty is bigger than the bun, yes! The brioche was nice and soft with a nice bite. The brussels sprouts were perfectly roasted, and best of all, the fries are real french fries. We plan to designate ChitChat our official Burger restaurant. Wvee wvill beee back!

Server was friendly. A nice place to get drinks with friends. We ordered an appetizer that never came out and when we went to cancel it, the manager still gave it to us free of charge. Excellent service. $6 shots was good, but there is a minimum of 2 per order!

My friend and I both seniors were going to the theatre  and needed to eat at a restaurant close by with good service.  We had never been to Chit Chats and we were amazed at everything about this restaurant from the food to the staff to the price. Oh and the chocolate cake was to die for. We ll be back  and certainly will recommend to others. Thank you for kicking off a very enjoyable evening
It was a great experience. I tried the VIVA LA GRANVILLE Burger. It was one of the best burgers Ive had in Vancouver. Details were very good.

OMG! This place is an absolute hidden gem. There used to be a Blaze pizza here and when it closed I was so disappointed that I didn t bother to look at what replaced it. Upon a friend s prodding I went finally visited last weekend. The owner is Albanian and super friendly. They have a limited menu which they do really well. The food was so good that I went back the next day to have more. The patio is a bit cramped but that s with all the patios on Granville street. The street s ambiance makes up for it. The inside is very well done and the music and friendly service only add to the atmosphere. Over the two visits I ve ordered the veggie and the pulled chicken burgers, and the chulu chulu fries. Everything was exceptional. The burgers are SO cheap for a sit down restaurant but taste absolutely gourmet. Do check out their extensive section of dips that you can order with your food. I particularly liked the spicy feta dip. I m coming back here many more times for sure!
Such a great street-side table. Great local beer. Delicious burgers. Sorry. I only review the 5 star places.

Great new restaurant on the Granville strip. Its the little sister of Hungry Guys across the street - totally different eats, but same great taste (everything made in house) and good value. Service was also a 10/10. Highlight 100% was the strawberry cheesecake milkshake!  They make the ice cream themselves! Tastes like a dairy Queen strawberry cheesecake Blizzard, but less sweet - perfect really, with a little sugar boost on the rim with some nostalgic nerd candies! If I could make a single suggestion...Id appreciate a music playlist with less profanity. Not to be a prude but I got sick of listening to F this F that on every.single.song.

The food was really good. Reasonable prices. Had a hard time finding a place that was open so late and this little spot saved the day. Music and vibes were great. Awesome service as well. Will definitely come back.

Very great atmosphere to sit down for drinks and appetizers. Me and my fiance say down and enjoyed a Mojito and an old fashion cocktails. The lights, music and energy in place was very nice. The poutine I ordered was not good, didnt enjoy the gravy.

Very nice place with a good vybe. The staff was very friendly and efficient. Didnt have to wait long for anything that we ordered. We had the Chit Chat burger (pictured), the classic and the  Viva la Granville. All tasted great and the prices are good too. Definitely recommend.
I love the vibe here whenever i come downtown i would come here and grab a drink the staff and the owner are friendly definitely recommend it
I love Chit Chat Burger! The staff and owners are so friendly and welcoming and the food is really decently priced. Really great vibes all around. I would highly recommend it!
The shots deals attracted me here lol the service is decent but everything is a good price, good music and food is worth what they charge. Picklebacks for life!
a very nice place! the food is delicious, they have happy hour on Sundays all day, the staff is very attentive and nice! excellent place to come with friends or for a date!!
Went for a few drinks and decided to get a burger and was not disappointed! Drinks were good , burger was absolutely exceptional and at.osphere was so good   really cool bar and chill vibes
Went there for the burger :) very nice + happy hour
The Irish girl who works there is so nice! We loved her. Food was very good. Will be back:)
The vegetarian burger 10/10 The drinks 10/10 The music also a vibe Food : 5/5

We popped in during happy hour and Ghazleh served us quick time. She was radiant with rainbow eye shadow and bandana. She was knowledgeable and quick with a fresh drink. The burger was juicy yet crisp and the bun was toasted yet gummy. Try the Viva La Granville!
Great burgers, tasty cocktails, delicious fries & super great service! Easy on the wallet too! Im coming here more often
Everything was perfect awesome taste  good quality Good prices   nice atmosphere friendly staff Persian music  Definitely We will back.
Excellent chit chat burger and great service from Victoria
Lively atmosphere with delicious burgers and a quality happy hour. What more could you want?
The food is tasty, cocktail is amazing. The seiner is nice and beautiful.
The mojitos and fries is  delicious. excellent service for Camila. Food
Absolutely delicious!!! The ambience is super nice too. Definitely a must have when wandering around downtown
Well priced drinks, nice ambience and good vibes.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Rupali. Thank you so much for the lovely comments. You are amazing!

review_text: We went to Chit Chat Burger Bar for the first time last night, and it was incredible! The aesthetic of the place was chic, with there blue seating and fake trees. The staff was super welcoming and kind, seating us quickly and accommodating our request to sit inside. The burgers were so good, with their warm buttery buns and fresh homemade beef patties. The cocktails & beer selection were excellent. The service was fast and food was fresh when it arrived. Only minor issue was the kitchen failed to add requested toppings to the burger, which kind of sucked, but once we told the server he was super apologetic. Highly recommend chit chat burger bar!

Cute place, friendly staff, delicious food! The Chit Chat burger did not disappoint. Great portion sizes for the appetizers. Really enjoyable atmosphere, good music and nice decor. We will definitely be back.
Fun place to get a burger and hangout for drinks. Music is great, love the staff! Everyone is very friendly and cheerful
Not your ordinary place to get margaritas - but I am telling you that this place makes the best margaritas in town. Chill vibes 10/10 would go again!

We just had at lunch at Chit Chat. We had the bean burger, a beef burger, chips and wings! It was all SO good. Delicious food. Also extremely clean premises and lovely service. Vegetarian options: Great bean burger!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Alecia. Thank you so much. Have a lovely weekend!

review_text: Great Burger bar, food looks great and tastes amazing, good price. Absolutely great staff.
Best burger I ve had in a while!! The fries were good on top but became very small and inedible underneath the first layer, other than that great food!!

I really recommend this bar restaurant . The place is very nice and have good music, the food is excellent, and customer service is the best. They have the best burgers of Vancouver and my favorite is the chicken one. I really recommend to try them. Prices are very reasonable, which make this place one of my favorite ones in Vancouver.
Their burgers are juicy homemade style with lots of toppings and fresh bread. The experience was a delight!
We came here for a few drinks after dinner. Very reasonable price for food and drinks.
Love the ambiance, drinks and the loaded fries. Definately a lively and different kind of bar. Well worth a visit.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Anam. You are amazing.

review_text: If you want a unique taste ,unique service and great atmosphere in middle of downtown,  I absolutely recommend here. I became their customer and I will recommend them to alllll my friends and family as our first choice of gathering in downtown. Manager is super friendly and professional and all staff are welcoming and their smiles just make you feel even better         thank you for great experience
response_from_owner_text: Hi Ati. Thank you soooo much for your positive feedback. We really appreciate you!

review_text: I love this place. I always feel safe there unlike many other places in the same Area. Aldo and Nader are real Gentlemans who always welcome me with a smile. The Athmosphere is also amazing. Food is good. Place is clean. What else can you ask for?! I strongly recommend this place.

Went on a Friday night and the atmosphere was AMAZING! The DJ was great, lighting was super moody and the decor is modern, but so sofisticares at the same time! Burger s so juicy and flavourful, the bun is super soft! Also got the chulu chulu fries, and they were my favourite! If you like tequila, mescal & jalapeno, order the  Small Talk  cocktail, it s great!!

I was pleasantly surprised with my visit to Chit Chat. I ordered the bacon cheese burger and fries with the garlic aioli.  I paid about $15 including tip, just barely more than I would have paid at a fast food place, but the food was much better quality. The service was fast and friendly. I took my good to go, but it was ready in about 15 minutes. The restaurant itself looks very nice and high end.  I will definitely be back.

I found this little gem a few weeks ago and I ve already been 5 times - the burgers are THAT good. Every aspect of the burger is amazing, from the buttery bun to the homemade patties. Absolutely to die for. I m not joking. And for $6 who could complain? The ambiance is trendy and the music makes you want to dance. This is my new favourite spot in the heart of downtown. Almost didn t want to write this review so I could keep it my secret
Nice interiors. Clean restrooms. Friendly staff. Reasonable prices. The manager was very kind and accommodating despite of the busy Halloween day. I will definitely be back.

This place has extremely good burgers! The staff were extremely welcoming and friendly, service was good. There was this man (who I think is the manager) who welcomed me into the restaurant. He said I wouldn t regret eating dinner here, and he was absolutely correct. By far one of the best burgers I ve had.
Really like this place. I ordered the bacon cheeses burger and normal fries. The burger was nice, juicy and the fries where well seasoned. Will definitely be back

This place is AMAZING. One of the few spots I m a regular at. Lovely lovely staff. Killer cocktails. And yummy noms. So glad I discovered this gem, really the highlight of Granville st! Pro tip: get classic fries with avocado, grilled mushrooms, and cilantro added on top if you want a tasty plant based option!

we had an issue but aldo (the owner) and luis were very helpful and accommodating. aldo provided me two sangrias and one shot with no charge! he also gave my friend and i some free credits for the weekend. i strongly recommend people to visit this bar!

Great place!  Was there Friday night.  Really nice decor and ambiance.  Awesome and friendly owner & staff.  They know how to treat their customers here.  Its busy and popular.  Food is fantastic, and well priced.  Dont bother with all these chain restaurants around, when theres this place.  Been here twice now and will always return whenever Im dt.
Thats a serious freaking shake lemme tell ya, best I ever had. Nice lil Veg patsky, have a big ol shimmy shake to wash down your burg and watch the action in zombietown.

Wonderful experience, beautiful decor, and magnificent staff. Our waitress was outstanding in her ability to preform under pressure as the place got busier and busier. Id love to come back here with some friends, or even a cheeky drink all on my own. I highly recommend.

We were walking around and stumbled upon this very upbeat and vibrant place. Not being from the area, we had no idea where to go so when the guy on the door engaged us, we figured we should check it out. Food was delicious, happy hour prices were great and music was very lively and fun.
Great location and the burger is very reasonably priced for its size. Server was friendly, even for take out. Worth going again. Id post a picture of my burger but, well, its all gone, ha.

In the top 3 for best burgers in the city, easily. Phenomenal food(for REALLY GOOD PRICES), perfect drinks, extremely friendly staff. Interior is stylish and pleasing. Truely one of my favourite establishments in the city, and Ive been here for 24 years. Walking by and the doorman said Good evening, come try our burgers and if you dont find them absolutely perfect I will pay for your entire meal. Needless to say, I paid for the dinner that night. That was a month ago. I have gone back 4 times now and its been consistently excellent. I CANNOT stress how much I enjoyed this place. One visit and I knew Id be back. I never simp for random eateries, but this place got me VIBING.

Ive eaten their burgers twice, and I must say the quality of food is excellent! Price is very good value too, for a nice, upscale-ish restaurant in downtown. They have an outdoor patio that is great for dining in during covid on a nice day. Servers are very friendly and helpful. Would come back here again!
Bacon & Cheese burger was delicious. Happy hour prices are good but the wine is mediocre. Still, that burger tho.
The best wings I ever had, fresh and delicious, good service and staff, reasonable price.
Delicious burgers, try the Chelada, its the only place in Vancouver Ive ever found one. Also, always has great party music playing.

We were down around the strip last night trying to find a place to eat. Colony was too busy. We were walking back and a rocket of a man, maybe in his late 40s with a grey ponytail, probably the owner, sorry I forgot your name bud, opened and closed us in a span of 3 seconds. Complimented the ladies we were with after checking their IDs and we were inside in a matter of seconds with our 10 people split group. Place is nice, with trees inside and your typical Philips hue coloured lights with salsa music and smiling waitresses. Good music and man oh man the burgers are cheap and good. Had the cheeseburger and fries. Nobody complained about the food and the prices. Apologies to the owner but he probably didn t expect us to get rowdy. We were all smushfaced. Money rained from the ceiling, baby Jesus floated down from the hue light saturated rafter and my life goals were instantly fulfilled. I can die happy, twice. Thanks, attractive pony tail man owner guy. We re still talking about how you 3 second closed a group of salespeople with your ridiculous charm to this day. Tl;dr: Door guy / owner is a rocket. Waitresses are units. Food is too good. I have no idea how they pay rent.

We ended up here looking for another restaurant, and I m glad we missed the other one n had dinner here! First, the staff is amazing! Super friendly, welcoming and quite efficient. Second, we order the  Chulu Chulu  n damn! All the ingredients were fresh n full of flavor! Then, the burgers, oh boy...everything from the buns to the meat were tasty, flavorful, juicy and... just delicious! Worth every penny! Finally, but not the least important, the music! Who ever is the Dj in charge of those mixes... respect! Old school stuff combined with the new stuff, in a very pleasant summer beach-terrace-downtowny-nightclub combination made our dinner quite a delightful experience. Definitely coming back soon!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Alejandro, We really appreciate the nice review. You re amazing

review_text: Amazing atmosphere and great burgers and fries. I ordered the Viva La Granville burger which had avocado, jalapeno and caramelized onions with regular fries. Cannot go wrong with the garlic aioli!

By far the best burger value in Vancouver... excellent patty and chewy bun.  I would think of it as a bigger and better In-N-Out burger... at a price that is not silly.  Cant comment on the evening scene here, I visited at lunch.

OMGoodness. The Beef Ragu fries are divine - that and their burgers. I wouldve shared a picture but I may or may not have scarfed it down to quickly. I will definitely be back and take pictures next time. Highly recommend!

The citys very best comfort Food! We tried the new Mac and Cheese-this is to die for. Im still thinking about it days later. Add menu items like these to the funky decor and you have  a fantastic eatery.

Was here on Halloween the Cowboy Bartender and Brittney Spears are 12/5s just true beauties that are friendly on point and make good drinks..... Good vibes at this place ! Didnt eat but drinks are great thanks again.
Fantastic food at a very reasonable price, service was great too! Definitely an excellent choice on the Granville Strip.
Awesome place, service and food! I went there today with wife, our first time, and everything was perfect. Best burger ever!

If I could give a place 10 stars I would! The staff bring that playful vibe that makes it feel like a local, they are interactive! Its the clean snazzy place granville is missing! Music is banging! 15 points to gryffindor, all about it, top notch, treat yourself! Not the hero we deserved but its the hero we need
Great place!! Loved the music! Loved the vibe! The cocktails were so delicious!! 100% recommended!!
Maybe the best hamburger Ive ever had. Nicely seasoned patty, fresh brioche, melty cheese, and all of it cooked just right so it was crispy and soft at the same time.
Quite busy on a Friday night, but no wait because I was on my own on a dinner break. The burger was fantastic, and reasonably priced. Will definitely return.

Delicious food. The burgers are great, made with a tasty toasted brioche bun. We had them with churu churu fries which was a combination of fries with cilantro and tomatoes sour cream and guacamole, delicious.
Amazing burgers. Simple and classic, and done perfectly. Very cool room too.
Amazing food. Great service. Everything is tasty. The location is great. The atmosphere is awesome. The music is the cherry on top.
The burgers are amazing!!! A simple menu thats done to perfection. The servers are awesome and the decor and atmosphere are lovely and inviting.
What a pleasant surprise! Chit Chat Burger was fantastic - the best burger & fries Ive had in ages, lovely staff and a nice atmosphere. Strongly recommend!!!
Great Food, great AMBIENCE. Staff is very friendly and ATTENTIVE! One of my favorite spots in Vancouver!
Good drinks, owner and staff were super friendly, bought a round for my brother and I. Id come here again. Good place to people watch. Games on TV but not blasting sound.

I get take out burgers from here. Probably the better burger spot in the area for a decent price. I usually get the bacon & cheese burger. It hits the spot. Everywhere else for burgers is disappointing
Small and intimate bar. The manager takes care everyone quite well.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Matt. Much appreciated!

review_text: Hands down the best burger joint in the city. Super fair prices and great service. Its only a matter of time you have to wait in line to get inside this place.
Amazing burgers. Made with fresh ingredients, best burger sauce I ve had in a while. I don t know if I ve had a better burger. This place is awesome!
Do not sleep on this place. It is fun. It is casual. It is tasty. It is sexy. Do yourself a favour and show up for a quick burger and beer, and stay all night for the granville street nightlife.
My husband and I had a great time tonight. Delicious burger and nice location. I just preferred to have a side for our burgers such as fries or salad. Thanks

Top drawer...truly top notch, well crafted cocktails (I watched the chef/owner/mixologist preparing some and his technique was clearly a professionally trained one. Some surprising food (make their own churros for the chocolate churro milkshake...warm, crunchy, and sugary, mmm). The happy hour menu has great deals (enough mint in the mojito to take home and save for my own cooking). The ambience a nice surprise for this part of the strip and you wouldnt expect such a cool, comfortable, and fresh interior based on the outside. Have been there several times now and its a regular for four of us.
The bean patty burger is so delicious. Of course recommend  .
Best burgers I ve tried in Vancouver
Great coctail (Old Fashion), and excellent service, especially the bar staff. Thank you very much!
Best burgers in town for sure. Owner is awesome and very accommodating to work around the ever changing restrictions. It s hands down the best spot on Grandville.

I was there tonight Wed. July 22, 2020 and was perfect all staff very cordial and the service was great, food was fantastic, every single one was working organize to do our experience perfect, i have over 20 years experience in F&B, i know what am talking about. keep like that, THANK YOU
Awesome place with friendly staff, good food and drinks.  The owner was super welcoming to us and the DJ was great! I d recommend.
Timely service, pretty good food given the price!!! If you want a cheap nice atmosphere to sit in at, this is the place !!

Juicy patties with lots of filling, between two soft buns. The corn dog, on the other hand, is a bit disappointing. Its not as tasty as the burgers. Favourite dish(es): Chicken Cutlet, Teriyaki Burger Service: Usually, one person is behind the counter. Great customer service. Other Comments: Check out the Street Food Vancouver app for their locations and hours. Recommend: Definitely a yes!

review_text: My favorite burger in Vancouver. If you re looking for amazing food, amazing service, and great experience then Wakwak is for you. They treat you like royalty, with an amazing smile. My favorite burger is the deluxe Teryaki cheese   heavenly !!

review_text: The regular burger is great value since it is freshly made and especially appreciated the caramelized onions in it, which help amplify the flavour.

Both were very good and enormous! The pork was bigger than the bun and the sauces were a perfect balance. Generous portion of cabbage made it feel like I got my daily requirement of veggies. Cant wait to try other menu items!

review_text: Good burger with Starbucks drink I met them in kitsilano food market last summer. Still taste good as usual Recommended dishes

review_text: I came across this burger truck while walking down Granville Street. The price got me to stop and look and the interesting Japanese style burgers got me to try and buy. I ordered the okonomi burger just because Ive never tried one. It was great and hit the spot. The only negative was the wait to order the food and the wait to get the food. Understanding it was lunch time it didnt take more than 6 min for both. If you need a quick bite, I can recommend this place.

One of the cheapest and best burger places in downtown Vancouver! This place is renowned for their famous $2.85 burger. I highly recommend you try one of these. I love these so much that I unintentionally took a bite out of mine before I took a picture of it. Also, quick tip: if the patty seems too thin, then get a double burger for only a dollar extra. Give it a try!

I didnt think Vancouver would have its own cheap burger stop that could stack up to other regional chains like In-N-Out or Shakeshack. Theyve got Bin 4, which is phenomenal-- but theyre definitely in the premium range of burger restaurants, which you cant really compare with street food or fast food, especially considering the hefty price. Wakwak, despite not being a chain, hits that cheap, quality burger craving perfectly. For me, its a bit of a trip, but always worth stopping by whenever Im downtown. Tried 4 items on their menu and all of them were fantastic. And with burgers these good starting at 2.85, you really cant complain.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much

review_text: Come on, folks. You cant complain about the value of this burger unless youre trying to run this wholesome place out of business. You get a fresh-tasting burger, with the option of making it messy but even tastier with their sauce (and topping) options. With fries and a drink, it makes for a decent meal thats around $10. Their sweet mozzarella corn dog is an absolute treat that belongs at all fairs - a crunchy, sugary, donut-like exterior with a gooey cheesy centre (more cheese to dog ratio). Plus, the staff is so energetic and all smiles. I only wish they would sell weekly in front of my workplace..
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much

review_text: We ve order cheese burger and Chicken Namban. I missed chicken namban so tried it:) it was very tasty and saucey, so eat it at home haha. Will try them next time they comes to River District!
